name: A Toilet Paper Flip Up! - Dash Hop Time
name_original: A Toilet Paper Flip Up! - Dash Hop Time
description:
Toilet Paper Flip Up! is a super addictive vertical bathroom jump game and the first installment of the adventures of tp Pete. Tap the screen to make Pete jump, hop, and dash up to avoid the plungers. Help our friendly hero reach new heights in this action packed new flip up game!

[Features]

> Endless dash avoidance game play
> Tap the screen to make Pete jump up
> Endless vertical dash up game play
> Hop up to avoid the plungers
> How high can you get?
> Fun for the kids and the whole family

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback? We would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@icustomized.net.
